full_summary:
# Commercial Cleaning Services for Embassy of Canada to United States of America

## Notice Details

* **Reference Number**: CB-273-33317036
* **Solicitation Number**: 24-241937
* **Publication Date**: 2023-12-08
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-01-09T14:00:00 (Expired)
* **Contact Information**
	+ Name: Nancy Levasseur
	+ Email: internationalproposals@international.gc.ca
	+ Phone: 343203000

## Tender Overview

The Embassy of Canada to the United States of America seeks a contractor to provide commercial cleaning services for a building of approximately 250,000 sqft, located at 501 Pennsylvania Avenue NW, Washington, DC, 20001. The services include cleaning services for the official residence (located at 2825 Rock Creek Drive NW, Washington, DC, 20008) and providing decent working and living conditions for occupants.

## Contract Details

* **Contract Period**: TBC
* **Contract Overview**: The contractor must provide cleaning services to the Embassy, including personnel, materials, labor, supervision, tools, equipment, and other related items, as specified in the contract.
* **Trade Agreements**: The contract is open to suppliers from Canada and countries that have trade agreements with Canada, including the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) and the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA).

## Tender Requirements

* **UNSPC Codes**: 76110000, 76111500, 76111501
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

## Attachments

For the tender notice and addenda, please visit the Canada Buys website:

* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27051/24-241937---commercial-cleaning-services-for-embassy-of-canada-to-united-states-of-america-in-washington-d.c.pdf
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27051/24-241937---addendum-1.pdf
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27051/24-241937---addendum-2.pdf

Note that this tender has expired. Suppliers are not encouraged to submit a bid.
